item.description:
In this FREE mini-workshop, you'll discover how your beliefs about love, intimacy and sexuality affect your relationships, sexual satisfaction, body image and ability to love. 

 

 

 

 

You’ll learn specific tools that will support you in:

 

  •  Enhancing your ability to identify core wants and needs
  •  Cultivating conscious communication skills vital to healthy relating
  •  Becoming more intimate with yourself and others 
  •  Staying in a place of love when it’s most difficult 

 

In this free mini-workshop (scheduled for 2-5 pm), you’ll have the opportunity to connect with others through a variety of exercises designed to open your heart and support you in sharing authentically with one another.  

 

Come and get a taste of what you’ve been craving in a totally safe, warm, loving and non-sexual environment.  Learn more about what the Human Awareness Institute has to offer.  

 

Ben Farris and I are looking forward to seeing you again!!!!

 

****This Meetup is obviously not a dance.  Instead this is an experiential workshop that has supported thousands of people in creating more love in their lives.  There'll be information about HAI, a personal growth organization.....and this event is FREE!  There'll be other Meetup groups invited and we expect a REALLY good turn out!
item.name: Find Love and Intimacy in Your Life!
